name: iAwake
description:
iAwake is a minimal puzzle game developed in 48 hours at Bahcesehir University Game Lab's 2nd Game Jam.

The concept of the game was minimal adventure.

Our team came up with the idea of using Six Steps of Enlightenment from Hindu Philosophy. We decomposed the concept into simple verbs and designed puzzles that will be only solved by listening the riddle and using your eyes via Tobii's Eye Tracking Hardware EyeX.
